text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea myrionerva (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Light Red Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree endemic to Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea myrionerva". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33427A9783641. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33427A9783641.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
